general_advisory: In low land, go for transplanting of 21 days rice seedlings in the main field. Keep rainwater in the main rice field by bunding for timely puddling and transplanting. Now beushaning can be performed where rainfall was adequate. In heavy rainfall areas, stop the sowing of seeds and top dressing of fertilisers or herbicides for the time being. Nursery sowing should be completed by the end of the 2nd fortnight of July. If infestation of thrips is noticed in the rice nursery, spray NSKE (Azadirachtin) @ 800 ml/acre or Lambda-Cyhyalothrin 5% EC @ 100 ml/acre or Thiamethoxam 25% WG @ 40g/acre. In case of seedling blight disease appearance, apply Propiconazole @ 1 ml/litre of water. Make provisions for drainage where maize or pulses etc. have been sown. Cover the vegetable nursery with polythene to protect it from heavy rain and make drainage arrangements.

advisory: Keep seed rate for black gram and green gram at 10 kg per acre.
Go for seed treatment before sowing.
Make provisions for drainage where maize has been sown.
Cover the vegetable nursery with polythene to protect it from heavy rain.
To manage mealy Bug in sugarcane crop, spray Imidacloprid 17.8% SL @ 60-ml/acre or Thiamethoxam 25% WG @ 40-gram/acre or Profenophos 50% EC @ 400-ml/acre by mixing it in 200 litres of water.
Transplanting of 20-25 days old seedlings should be done at a spacing of 20x15 cm, plant 2-3 seedlings per hill for high-yielding varieties.
